snippet: Russia's government has approved a new tax law to clamp down on Russian companies and individuals using offshore tax shelters....

headline.print_headline: Russian Government Approves Law to Clamp Down on Offshore Tax Sheltering
headline.main: Russian Government Approves Law to Clamp Down on Offshore Tax Sheltering

lead_paragraph: Russia's government has approved a new tax law to clamp down on Russian companies and individuals using offshore tax shelters.
